resource_dependency.pollListDataSchema: Database table 'polls' with fields: poll_id (UUID), title (string), description (text), created_at (datetime), category (string), options (array of strings), creator_id (UUID).

function: Display a list of available polls for users to browse.
static_description: A vertically scrollable page with a white background and navy-colored cards displaying each poll's title, short description, creation date, and category. Navigation bar at the top includes icons for home, filter, and profile.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on a poll card navigates to the detailed poll view. Clicking on filter icon opens sorting/filtering options.
Scrolling loads more polls dynamically if pagination is enabled.

resource_dependency.voteSubmissionAPISpec: POST /api/vote with body { poll_id, option_index } returning success status.
resource_dependency.votingOptionsDataSchema: Field 'options' within the 'polls' table stores selectable choices as an array of strings.

function: Allow users to select and vote for specific poll options.
static_description: Poll detail page showing full description, metadata, and radio buttons or clickable divs styled in navy representing each voting option.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting an option highlights it. Submitting sends the selection via POST request to the voting endpoint.

resource_dependency.resultsUpdateAPISpec: GET /api/poll/{id}/results returning updated vote counts per option.
resource_dependency.resultVisualizationComponent: Bar chart library such as Chart.js or D3.js

function: Show real-time or updated voting results after submission.
static_description: Results section appears immediately after voting, featuring a horizontal bar graph with navy bars indicating percentage distribution among options.

interaction_and_states.description: Refreshing manually fetches latest data from the results API.

resource_dependency.themeCSSFile: Global CSS variables defining --background-color: #ffffff; and related styling rules.

function: Implement a clean user interface with white background.
static_description: Entire application uses a solid white background across all pages and components.

resource_dependency.navyThemeStylesheet: CSS classes and global styles applying navy (#000080) to text, borders, buttons, and interactive elements.

function: Style all UI components with navy color scheme.
static_description: All buttons, headers, links, form controls, and active states use consistent navy coloring throughout the site.

resource_dependency.detailedPollViewSchema: Expanded dataset from GET /api/poll/{id} including extended description, metadata, and full options list.

function: Enable users to view detailed poll information before voting.
static_description: Detailed view displays long-form description, creation timestamp, creator name, and categorized tags beneath the main question heading.

interaction_and_states.description: Back button returns to the poll list. Vote button becomes enabled only when an option is selected.

resource_dependency.successFeedbackAnimation: Green checkmark SVG animation or Toast notification module.

function: Provide visual feedback when a vote is successfully submitted.
static_description: After successful vote submission, a green checkmark animates briefly near the submit button followed by a toast message confirming receipt.

resource_dependency.resultChartLibrary: Pre-configured chart rendering component capable of parsing numeric result arrays into proportional visuals.

function: Ensure poll results are displayed in an easily understandable format.
static_description: Results shown as labeled horizontal bars with percentages overlaying each segment, accompanied by total votes count above the chart.

resource_dependency.navigationRoutesMap: { '/': Poll List, '/poll/:id': Poll Detail, '/results/:id': Results View }
resource_dependency.routerConfig: React Router or similar client-side routing setup.

function: Include navigation between different sections of the website.
static_description: Top navigation bar provides persistent access to Home, My Votes, and Categories sections regardless of current location.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking navigation items transitions smoothly between views without full page reload.

resource_dependency.sessionTrackingMechanism: JWT-based cookie or localStorage token storing unique voter identifier tied to device/browser.
resource_dependency.duplicateVoteCheckLogic: Backend logic preventing multiple votes based on stored identifiers and IP logging.

function: Maintain user session or tracking to prevent duplicate voting.
static_description: No visible indicators; however, system prevents re-voting through backend validation upon subsequent attempts.

interaction_and_states.description: Attempting to re-vote shows an alert stating 'Youâ€™ve already voted in this poll.'

resource_dependency.pollMetadataFieldsDefinition: Additional fields in 'polls' schema: created_at (timestamp), last_updated (timestamp), author_display_name (string)

function: Display poll creation date and relevant metadata.
static_description: Each poll card and detail view includes small italicized text showing creation time, author, and update history where applicable.

resource_dependency.responsiveGridFramework: CSS media queries and flexbox/grid configurations ensuring layout adapts to mobile/tablet/desktop breakpoints.

function: Implement responsive design for various screen sizes.
static_description: Layout adjusts column count, font scaling, and spacing dynamically while preserving usability on phones, tablets, and desktop monitors.

resource_dependency.errorHandlingModule: Centralized error display mechanism showing inline messages or modal popups depending on severity.

function: Include error handling for invalid selections or submissions.
static_description: Error messages appear below affected inputs or centrally as modals, styled consistently with red text against light backgrounds.

interaction_and_states.description: Retry or dismiss actions clear transient errors and allow resubmission.

resource_dependency.WCAGComplianceGuide: Document outlining contrast ratios, keyboard navigation paths, ARIA labeling standards.

function: Provide accessibility features for inclusive user experience.
static_description: Screen reader labels accompany interactive elements, focus outlines follow standard visibility guidelines, and semantic HTML structures support assistive tools.

interaction_and_states.description: Pressing Tab cycles through actionable items in logical reading order.

resource_dependency.sortFilterAPISpec: Query parameters for GET /api/polls?category=...&sortBy=date allowing dynamic filtering/sorting.

function: Enable sorting or filtering of polls by categories or dates.
static_description: Dropdown menu labeled 'Sort By' allows selecting filters like Recent, Popular, or Category. Filtered results replace existing list instantly.

interaction_and_states.description: Choosing a sort option triggers new API call with appropriate query parameters and refreshes the poll list accordingly.
